artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Blue dominates. Plain weave or Twill variation. Similar to Pomegranate. Blue & 2 greens warp. Weft divided into 5 different samplings using med green, med blue, metallic teal, olive. Plain weave and variations. Right selvedge. Stapled to 8.5x11" card. "H-8B" written on card.

title: Lapis Development Sample
